verses.verse: The <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and the solitary <S%H6723>place<s%> shall be <S%H7797>glad<s%> for them; and the <S%H6160>desert<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, and <S%H6524>blossom<s%> as the <S%H2261>rose<s%>.

It shall <S%H6524>blossom<s%> <S%H6524>abundantly<s%>, and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> even with <S%H1525>joy<s%> and <S%H7444>singing<s%>: the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto it, the <S%H1926>excellency<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H8289>Sharon<s%>, they shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H1926>excellency<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%> to them that are of a <S%H4116>fearful<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: behold, your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, even <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H1576>recompence<s%>; he will <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> you.
Then the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H5787>blind<s%> shall be <S%H6491>opened<s%>, and the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> shall be <S%H6605>unstopped<s%>.

Then shall the <S%H6455>lame<s%> man <S%H1801>leap<s%> as an <S%H354>hart<s%>, and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%>: for in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> shall <S%H4325>waters<s%> break <S%H1234>out<s%>, and <S%H5158>streams<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert<s%>.

And the parched <S%H8273>ground<s%> shall become a <S%H98>pool<s%>, and the thirsty <S%H6774>land<s%> <S%H4002>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: in the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, where each <S%H7258>lay<s%>, shall be <S%H2682>grass<s%> with <S%H7070>reeds<s%> and <S%H1573>rushes<s%>.

And an <S%H4547>highway<s%> shall be there, and a <S%H1870>way<s%>, and it shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness<s%>; the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> shall not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring <S%H1980>men<s%>, though <S%H191>fools<s%>, shall not <S%H8582>err<s%> therein.

No <S%H738>lion<s%> shall be there, nor any <S%H6530>ravenous<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> thereon, it shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> there; but the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> there:

And the <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with <S%H7440>songs<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>: they shall <S%H5381>obtain<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> and <S%H8342>gladness<s%>, and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> and <S%H585>sighing<s%> shall flee <S%H5127>away<s%>.
